Package es.uam.eps.ir.relison.sna.metrics.communities.graph.gini.degree.sizenormalized

Class SizeNormalizedInterCommunityDegreeGini<U>

java.lang.Object
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.sna.metrics.communities.graph.gini.degree.sizenormalized.SizeNormalizedCommunityDegreeGini<U>
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.sna.metrics.communities.graph.gini.degree.sizenormalized.SizeNormalizedInterCommunityDegreeGini<U>
Type Parameters:
U - type of the users.
All Implemented Interfaces:
CommunityMetric<U>
public class SizeNormalizedInterCommunityDegreeGini<U>
extends SizeNormalizedCommunityDegreeGini<U>
Computes the community degree Gini of the graph, i.e. the Gini coefficient for the degree distribution of the communities in the graph. This version only considers the inter-community links for the calculus.
Author:
Javier Sanz-Cruzado (javier.sanz-cruzado@uam.es), Pablo Castells (pablo.castells@uam.es)
